tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  TOUGH GRADER  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS
comments: Bad socializing skills and tough grader. Looks down on students and is extremely slow at grading and giving feedback on papers. Blames students for something that is the professor\'s fault. Should teach medieval literature instead of English.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Extremely tough grader & takes rough drafts for a grade and usually fails the student. Terrible teacher; she uses 1st grade level sentences despite this being a college course. Has no set curriculum & gives out useless activities in class. She does not believe in climate change & she once failed a student\'s paper because they argued for it.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: She is very pleasant but grades rather hard. You can tell that she much prefers writing to teaching English. The worst thing about her was how unprepared she was, always running late. She can be a little rude sometimes, but overall she\'s a C-

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: She SEEMS nice, but she grades extremely hard and unfair, she picks favorites. She failed me because of one flaw in one paper. Boo you
